titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene yarn measuring not less than 131 decitex but not more than 340 decitex.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene yarn measuring not less than 131 decitex but not more than 340 decitex.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene yarn measuring not less than 131 decitex but not more than 340 decitex.
